snippet.name: cfUniForm Select Box Query Options
snippet.help: Inserts a query-driven select box option list (cfUniForm option tag)
snippet.starttext: <cfloop query="$${Query Name (e.g. qFoo)}"> <uform:option display="#$${Query Name (e.g. qFoo)}.$${Query Display Column}[currentRow]#" value="#$${Query Name (e.g. qFoo)}.$${Query ID Column}[currentRow]#" isSelected="#$${Compare To Variable (e.g. foo.getId())} EQ $${Query Name (e.g. qFoo)}.$${Query ID Column}[currentRow]#" /> </cfloop>
